identity.description: Paper-based metadata example derived from Werner et al. (Communications Physics, 2025; DOI:10.1038/s42005-025-02396-4). This work proposes/analyses a local measurement scheme for gravitational curvature using atom interferometers. The public record does not expose detailed hardware specifications, so this instance focuses on the declared measurand and intent.

pulseSequence.notes: Differential signal of two co-located interferometers designed to isolate a phase shift proportional to gravitational curvature.

performance.measurand: Gravitational curvature (via differential phase of co-located interferometers)
